meeting_info.organization: Government Performance and Financial Management Committee
meeting_info.location: City Hall, Dallas, Texas (also available via video conference)

agenda_items.title: Approval of the December 10, 2024, Government Performance and Financial Management Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: ARPA Spending Update and Recommended Reprogramming
agenda_items.description: Update on ARPA spending and recommendations for reprogramming funds.

agenda_items.title: CDBG Extension of Spending Requirements and Recommended Reprogramming
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the extension of spending requirements for CDBG and recommendations for reprogramming.

agenda_items.title: Performance Review for City Auditor
agenda_items.description: Performance review for the City Auditor.

agenda_items.title: Monthly Budget Accountability Report
agenda_items.description: Report on the monthly budget accountability.

agenda_items.title: Technology Accountability Report (Information as of Dec 30, 2024)
agenda_items.description: Report on technology accountability as of December 30, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Office of the City Auditor Monthly Internal Update on Internal Audit Reports
agenda_items.description: Monthly update on internal audit reports released between November 23, 2024, and January 17, 2025.

agenda_items.title: Office of the City Auditor Annual Report - Fiscal Year 2024 Annual Report
agenda_items.description: Annual report from the Office of the City Auditor for fiscal year 2024.

agenda_items.title: Report on Progress of Family Gateway Property Repairs as of December 2024
agenda_items.description: Update on the progress of repairs for Family Gateway properties.

agenda_items.title: Report on the 70th Supplemental Bond Ordinance and 71st Supplemental Bond Ordinance
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the bond ordinances authorizing Dallas Fort Worth International Airport to issue up to $3 billion of debt.

agenda_items.title: City Hall Space Planning Project
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the City Hall space planning project.

agenda_items.title: Potential Legislative Changes to Housing Finance Corporations
agenda_items.description: Discussion on potential legislative changes affecting housing finance corporations.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item # 25-206A for the Feb 12, 2025, City Council Meeting
agenda_items.description: Seeking authorization of a three-year contract with West Publishing Corporation for online legal research and associated services.

agenda_items.title: Review of City Real Estate for Development, Sale, and Redevelopment
agenda_items.description: Discussion of CBRE review of city real estate.

agenda_items.title: Real Estate
agenda_items.description: Closed session to deliberate the purchase, exchange, lease, or value of real property.
